pkgmetadata.longdescription: Nonparametric Bootstrap Test for Regression Monotonicity // Implements nonparametric bootstrap tests for detecting monotonicity in regression functions from Hall, P. and Heckman, N. (2000) doi:10.1214/aos/1016120363 Includes tools for visualizing results using Nadaraya-Watson kernel regression and supports efficient computation with 'C++'.
